Class ReviewPersistenceException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable

All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
DuplicateReviewEntityException, ReviewEntityNotFoundException
public class ReviewPersistenceException
extends ReviewManagementException

This exception will be thrown by ReviewPersistence and its implementation if any error occurred during persisting the review entity.

Version:
1.0
Author:
woodjhon, urtks
